about_the_game:
"Hooligan simulator" is all about surviving in the urban jungle. You have no money and any perspective for a future. It is time to change this and make better things happen. All you need to do is start to act. Respect among guys from neighborhood is first thing to achieve.



Police are your enemy, stay cautious and don't get caught. You need to sneak around to avoid officers, be smart or simply fight with your fists. Parkour skills will help you with that.



Train your boxing skills. Best punching bags are people's walking on the street. It is also an opportunity to still some money or jewellery.



Your motto is The World is Yours. Why not arrange it according to your preference. Paint a graffiti, destroy a road sign and public properties.



More evil you are - more respect you get. Become a person who spread fear among enemies.

Other game features :
  • Vast city environment
  • Lots of skills to help you become an outlaw icon
  • Illegal businesses management
  • Gangs fights
  • and many more...
detailed_description:
"Hooligan simulator" is all about surviving in the urban jungle. You have no money and any perspective for a future. It is time to change this and make better things happen. All you need to do is start to act. Respect among guys from neighborhood is first thing to achieve.



Police are your enemy, stay cautious and don't get caught. You need to sneak around to avoid officers, be smart or simply fight with your fists. Parkour skills will help you with that.



Train your boxing skills. Best punching bags are people's walking on the street. It is also an opportunity to still some money or jewellery.



Your motto is The World is Yours. Why not arrange it according to your preference. Paint a graffiti, destroy a road sign and public properties.



More evil you are - more respect you get. Become a person who spread fear among enemies.

Other game features :
  • Vast city environment
  • Lots of skills to help you become an outlaw icon
  • Illegal businesses management
  • Gangs fights
  • and many more...
name: Hooligan Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Become a hooligan, get respect in your neighborhood and try any unethical ways can get you rich quick & fast.
